mapper.update: UPDATE board SET answer_check = 1 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT A.cnt FROM(SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM answer WHERE seq = #{seq}) A WHERE A.cnt > 0 ) AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.* FROM( SELECT TT1.rnum as num, TT1.seq as seq, TT1.gubun as "gubun", TT1.gubun_question as "gubunQuestion", TT1.title as "title", TT1.contents as "contents", -- 당일이면 시:분, 그렇지 않으면 년-월-일 DECODE( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ,TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD')) as regDt, TT1.reg_id FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, T1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE gubun = #{gubun} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC ) T1 -- 종료 번호 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize} ) TT1 -- 시작번호 WHERE ROWNUM >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1 ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM board --WHERE 조건 WHERE gubun = #{gubun} ) B

SELECT seq as seq, gubun as "gubun", gubun_question as "gubunQuestion", title as "title", contents as "contents", TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDt, reg_id FROM board WHERE gubun = #{gubun}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( seq, gubun, gubun_question, title, contents, reg_dt, reg_id, answer_check ) VALUES ( seq.NEXTVAL, #{gubun}, #{gubunQuestion}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{regId}, #{answerCheck} )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, gubun, gubun_question, title, contents, reg_id, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MISS') reg_dt , answer_check as answerCheck FROM board WHERE seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq
